```{r}
antropomorfico <- image_read(here::here("data/antropomorfico.png"))
image_scale(antropomorfico, "100")
antropomorfico <- image_fill(antropomorfico,'none')
antropomorfico <- rasterGrob(antropomorfico, interpolate=TRUE)

pie <- image_read(here::here("data/pizza.png"))
image_scale(pie, "100")
pie <- image_fill(pie,'none')
pie <- rasterGrob(pie, interpolate=TRUE)
```

```{r}
statistic %>%
  ggplot(aes(mean_justodoar, narrative)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  geom_errorbarh(aes(xmin=mean_justodoar-sd_justodoar, xmax=mean_justodoar+sd_justodoar), height = 0) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(0, 7, 1), limits=c(0, 7)) +
  labs(x = "Quão justo é doar?", y = "Narrativa")
#+ annotation_custom(antropomorfico, xmin=2, xmax=4, ymin=(as.numeric(as.factor("Extrema Pobreza")) + 0.5), ymax=Inf) +
#  annotation_custom(pie, xmin=2, xmax = 4, ymin = -Inf, ymax=(as.numeric(as.factor("Escola"))) + 0.5)
   
ggsave("../data/justodoar.png",width=8, height=4)
```

```{r}
statistic %>%
```
